to: To My Babii Jerrylyn Dela Vega
title: eLuvLetter
text: On this special day, I want you to know that my love for you grows stronger with each passing moment. You are the light that brightens my days, the warmth that fills my heart. Happy Valentine's Day, babii kooo. Here's to countless more moments of joy and love together. I Love You Babii kooo😘🤗❤️
